channel.title: Need Help Badly!
channel.description:
I need help with an NPC problem, i was wondering if any1 can tell me How to change what an NPC is saying for Example on my server a Dark mage Says:
Welcome to Openrune The owner is *i forgot name ^^*
i was wondering if any1 new how to change it to
Welcome to 0wn3d Sc4p3 The owner is 0wn3d pl0x
Or if u wish Add me on Msn: shaneedwardgeorge@hotmail.com and tell me there.
Thank you

item.title: Need Help Badly!
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

kay … I just explained that why post again …

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Badly!
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

Go into your NPCHANDLER.Java. Then pess CTRL+F and search for Welcome To Openrune Then you should see what you want and then just replace it with Welcome to 0wn3d Sc4p3 The owner is 0wn3d pl0x

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Badly!
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Go to npchandeler in your server folder and search for whatever the npc says right now and change it to what you want it to say it should say offline and online so put what you want it to say when your online and offline and you can change the npc number bye searching for the npc that says that.Then save + compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Badly!
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

hmmm
i believe that you do ctrl+h when your in the document.
next in the first box type in what is being said, and in the second type in what u want it to say.
then just hit replace all and it should then say the name of your server.

Read full topic
